title: The Raw Shark Texts
author: Steven Hall

quote_last: “Something’s going on out there,” Ramirez yelled, grabbing Helling’s arm. “I saw flashes of light. Somebody’s shooting. See it? Over there.” He was pointing.
title: Project Cyclops
author: Thomas Hoover
